title: Romance for Matthew
description: Bethany has to work, in spite of having a six month old baby, and takes a job as an assistant to a 'special needs' man. She is surprised at the growing attraction she feels towards her boss. Can she ever forget her husband and move on with her life? As The Lord gives her more and more challenges to handle, her faith is shaken to the core. Matthew, her new boss, 'sees' her in his heart, but has his own set of problems, as his faith is also tested to the limit. How can he help Bethany when he can't even help himself?
author: Nancy Fornataro
